content.raw:
Hello Sir Shane!

We've been having a problem with gazebo randomly crashing due to a segfault upon starting.

We are launching gazebo (7.6) via roslaunch.

Particularly, we are launching the following package:
https://github.com/udacity/simple_arm_01

Observations:

* It does not seem to happen with great frequency, perhaps 1 out of 20 launches

* If you don't wait for a while (less than 30 seconds, more than 5) after roscore has died, the problem seems to happen again.

* The log messages contain anything

The virtual machine image that we've been using (runnable in the free VMWare Player) is here:

https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/udacity-robotics/Virtual+Machines/Ubuntu_032717/Ubuntu%2B64-bit.zip

I've attached the console output, in case it's of any service.

Thanks!
content.html:
Hello Sir Shane!

We've been having a problem with gazebo randomly crashing due to a segfault upon starting.

We are launching gazebo (7.6) via roslaunch.

Particularly, we are launching the following package: https://github.com/udacity/simple_arm_01

Observations:

  • It does not seem to happen with great frequency, perhaps 1 out of 20 launches

  • If you don't wait for a while (less than 30 seconds, more than 5) after roscore has died, the problem seems to happen again.

  • The log messages contain anything

The virtual machine image that we've been using (runnable in the free VMWare Player) is here:

https://s3-us-west-1.amazonaws.com/udacity-robotics/Virtual+Machines/Ubuntu_032717/Ubuntu%2B64-bit.zip

I've attached the console output, in case it's of any service.

Thanks!
